section.name: Adaptors
section.p: The adaptors can handle MBean attributes and operations of a wide variety of class types.

subsection.name: IRC adaptor
subsection.p: The following IRC bot commands are available:

tr.td: lists all MBeans, where query is an optional ObjectName wildcard
create <MBean name> <class name> <string param 1> ... <string param N>

subsection.name: JMS adaptor
subsection.p: This is similar to the IRC adaptor. Send a text message containing "help" to get a list of commands.
